content: MW-C ceiling clip Multifunctional loop clamp for fastening MW wire rope suspension systems to any vertical, horizontal or sloped surface ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster installation – simply hook the looped end of a wire rope into the loop clamp and anchor it into position Versatile – you can hang MW wire rope suspension systems from any plumb, inclined or level surface with the same mounting bracket Easy to handle – loop clamp delivered ready to anchor CE mark (DIN EN 13964) Applications Hanging wire rope MEP suspension systems from concrete T-beams Hanging wire rope MEP suspension systems from sloped or flat ceilings Fastening wire rope MEP suspension systems to walls Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only Compatible with 1.5, 2.0, 3.0 and 5.0 Hilti wire rope ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2287563 - Clip MW-C - Package Size 50 pc
